metadata.synopsis: After the goblin hunt celebration party, this companion has made arrangements to get intimate with the player at night.

60.speaker: Shadowheart
60.text: You made it. Come here - sit with me.
60.context:
CinematicNodeContext: ~Shadowheart is sitting at the side of a cliff or wall, knees up--the player joins, dangling their feet over the edge.
~She smiles, pours a cup, and offers the player a cup of wine hands it to the playerNodeContext: Shadowheart is sitting with a bottle in her hand.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: What do you have in mind? Besides the bottle, that is.

124.speaker: Player
124.text: I wouldn't dream of missing it.

25.speaker: Shadowheart
25.text: So eager. I'm surprised it took you this long.

118.speaker: Shadowheart
118.text: Well, to begin, I think a toast is in order. Any suggestions?
118.context: NodeContext: Shadowheart is sitting, and pours wine into a pair of cups.

165.speaker: Shadowheart
165.context: CinematicNodeContext: Glass raised in a toast.NodeContext: A toast, Shadowheart is sitting down.

120.speaker: Shadowheart
120.text: Very practical. We could've toasted to that every night so far.

137.speaker: Shadowheart
137.context: NodeContext: A toast, Shadowheart is sitting down.

123.speaker: Shadowheart
123.text: I suppose I'll find out. To us.
123.context: NodeContext: A toast, Shadowheart is sitting down.

78.speaker: Shadowheart
78.text: Very well, have it your way. To friendship.
78.context: NodeContext: A toast, Shadowheart is sitting down.

8.speaker: Shadowheart
8.text: Now tell me something about yourself.

14.speaker: Shadowheart
14.text: And no tadpoles, dragons, marauding goblins, or anything like that. Something about you.
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player stares intently into their drink, contemplating an answerNodeContext: Shadowheart is sitting down.

114.speaker: Player
114.text: Something about me? I'm surprised you cared.

85.speaker: Shadowheart
85.text: Fishing for blackmail material, that's all.
85.context: NodeContext: Said with a flirtatious smirk Shadowheart is sitting down.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Tell her about your death - how you'd been attacked by a Gur tribe and 'saved' by Cazador.

56.speaker: Player
56.text: Tell her the darkness inside of you wasn't caused by an accident. It was done out of love for someone.

64.speaker: Shadowheart
64.text: Don't stop now. Not just as things are getting interesting...

110.speaker: Player
110.text: I'm not sure what else I can say.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Sounds like you just need a little more liquid inspiration.

88.speaker: Player
88.text: Your turn - I insist. A little give and take is only fair.

82.speaker: Shadowheart
82.text: Don't laugh... but I'm not quite sure I have anything to share.

145.speaker: Shadowheart
145.text: When you worship Shar, secrecy is everything. We'll sacrifice our own memories when ordered to.

18.speaker: Shadowheart
18.text: A lot of the little things... they're lost to me right now.

115.speaker: Player
115.text: Do you think your memories will ever come back?

72.speaker: Shadowheart
72.text: Perhaps, but please - enough about me. Sharing's bad for my complexion.

136.speaker: Player
136.text: Wrong. You like night orchids and can't swim. You told me once.

76.speaker: Shadowheart
76.text: Heh, I did! And you remembered.

3.speaker: Shadowheart
3.text: It helps me create all new memories.

105.context: CinematicNodeContext: The scene transitions as SH and the player continue to bond and talk the night away. Things pick back up just before morning.

50.speaker: Shadowheart
50.text: Nearly light. The others will be awake soon...
50.context:
CinematicNodeContext: ~The player and Shadowheart both layer on the wall, back flat but feet dangling over of the edge as the sun starts to come up
~Shadowheart lifts the wine bottle and gives it one last shake over her mouth, it's empty, she sets it back downNodeContext: Shadowheart is sitting down.

129.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player looks over at Shadowheart, who looks back when she realizes she's being observed

127.speaker: Shadowheart
127.context: NodeContext: Coy. Shadowheart is sitting down.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: I hope there'll be more to come.

37.speaker: Narrator
37.text: *She trails off. You read an invitation in her eyes.*
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Shadowheart looks at the player, after spending a long night getting to know eachother, she wonders how much further she wants this to go, and how much the the player wants to go

132.speaker: Player
132.text: I wish I could kiss you.

71.speaker: Shadowheart
71.text: You read my mind. But with your fire... our first kiss might be our last.

55.speaker: Shadowheart
55.text: Karlach. You're very beautiful, you know. I might even kiss you if I valued my life a little less.

33.speaker: Shadowheart
33.text: But I can be patient, and I think you can too. Who knows what the future will bring our way?
33.context: NodeContext: flirtatious but a little chastened

83.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart and the player kiss. A flicker of her strange magic blossoms as they do.

106.speaker: Shadowheart
106.context: NodeContext: A hint of worry in her voice. Shadowheart expects any flare of her magic to cause other people pain. She is still sitting.

53.speaker: Shadowheart
53.text: Good to know. For the future...

163.speaker: Shadowheart
163.text: Let's head back. If we must.
163.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Shadowheart and the player stand up an walk away from the edge togetherNodeContext: Post-kiss. Shadowheart reluctantly gets to her feet.

75.speaker: Shadowheart
75.text: I'd like to think that would've happened anyway.

70.speaker: Player
70.text: You know, if you want something... I think you should take it.

69.speaker: Shadowheart
69.context: NodeContext: The player refused to kiss Shadowheart. She tries to stifle her disappointment and stands up.

116.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Shadowheart sits back up, picking up the bottle of wine and walking away, the player doesn't follow

35.speaker: Player
35.text: You know, if you want something... I think you should take it.

68.speaker: Player
68.text: We should do this again sometime.

61.speaker: Shadowheart
61.text: Oh... yes. I suppose we'll have to.

46.speaker: Shadowheart
46.context: InternalNodeContext: Approval dropNodeContext: The player failed to pick up on a cue to kiss her. Shadowheart starts to stand up.

113.speaker: Shadowheart
113.context: InternalNodeContext: Approval dropNodeContext: The player failed to pick up on a cue to kiss her. Shadowheart starts to stand up.

40.speaker: Shadowheart
40.text: It was just what I needed.

34.speaker: Player
34.text: There's no need to thank me.

158.speaker: Player
158.text: Just checking for signs of ceremorphosis.

63.speaker: Shadowheart
63.text: Oh, I'm perfectly fine, but the mood is well and truly dead.

4.speaker: Shadowheart
4.text: Bashful come the light of day?

151.speaker: Player
151.text: The others can wait. I don't want this to end just yet.

22.speaker: Shadowheart
22.text: Another moment won't kill them, I suppose... Well, it might, but let's take that risk.

111.speaker: Shadowheart
111.text: I suppose so. Celebration's over - time to pick up the trail again.

121.speaker: Player
121.text: That's a convenient way to avoid the question.

94.speaker: Shadowheart
94.text: But please - enough about me. Sharing's bad for my complexion.

38.speaker: Shadowheart
38.text: Where I come from, that's frowned upon.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: What, you're discouraged from confiding? Talking about your feelings? Sounds... lonely.

154.speaker: Shadowheart
154.text: Which is why I'm looking for a little company.

95.speaker: Shadowheart
95.text: Good. A little mystery will keep you on your toes.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: Fair enough. I didn't mean to pry.

155.speaker: Shadowheart
155.text: Oh? And what else do you find to be fair?

66.speaker: Shadowheart
66.text: You don't waste time, do you?

59.speaker: Player
59.text: Straight answers. Got any for me?

65.speaker: Shadowheart
65.text: Straight answers are overrated. Where's the discovery?

138.speaker: Shadowheart
138.text: Oh, I see. Think I can't get you to confess? I'm something of an expert.
138.context: NodeContext: Shadowheart is sitting down. Said with wry amusement.

87.speaker: Player
87.text: We should head back. We might be missed.

156.speaker: Shadowheart
156.text: I'm sure they'd last another while without us. But if you insist...

79.speaker: Player
79.text: I suppose there's not that much of a rush.

32.speaker: Shadowheart
32.text: Nothing worthwhile should be rushed anyway.

166.speaker: Shadowheart
166.text: There's still plenty of wine and the whole night ahead of us.

108.speaker: Shadowheart
108.text: Well then. Head on back. I'm sure your cold bedroll is missing you terribly.

159.speaker: Player
159.text: Tell her about a quiet spot in Avernus you used to visit. Ugly as sin, but at least you could be alone.

140.speaker: Shadowheart
140.text: I can relate. I think I used to have a place of my own I liked to retreat to... but it slips my mind.
140.context: NodeContext: Empathetic, with a trace of deja vu.

122.speaker: Player
122.text: Lower your guard and describe the desolate beauty of your home: Crèche K'liir.

164.speaker: Shadowheart
164.text: Merciless, but beautiful in its own way... Sounds familiar.

109.speaker: Player
109.text: Relate Mizora's hold over you - and your eagerness to be free.

161.speaker: Shadowheart
161.text: Does that mean you're spoken for or not? Heh.

104.speaker: Player
104.text: Speak of dedication to your clan above all else. A life of honour and duty that supersedes even blood.

153.speaker: Shadowheart
153.text: I can respect that sort of loyalty. It's not all that removed from what was instilled in me...

54.speaker: Player
54.text: Speak of an uncertain youth, neither fully at home with humans or orcs. A youth that forged resilience, self-reliance.

112.speaker: Player
112.text: Share a little memory from growing up in Baldur's Gate.

142.speaker: Shadowheart
142.text: Seems like you truly know the city. I never got to explore it to my liking.

119.speaker: Player
119.text: There are other things we could do besides talk.

23.speaker: Shadowheart
23.text: Oh, I'm aware. Several come to mind right now... but I'm going to tempt fate and say we can take our time.

9.speaker: Shadowheart
9.text: Oh, no. I provided the refreshments. You can supply the entertainment.

150.speaker: Player
150.text: You can be tricky sometimes, you know.

24.speaker: Shadowheart
24.text: I know. One of my many fine qualities.

15.speaker: Player
15.text: Thank her for the wine and leave.

117.speaker: Shadowheart
117.text: You... All right, then. More the fool me.
117.context: NodeContext: Shadowheart is sitting down, failing to hide her disappointment.

10.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player sets their cup on the ground and walks away, Shadow tips the cup over after the player departs

128.speaker: Player
128.text: I seem to recall a campful of goblins faring very poorly after a toast.

36.speaker: Shadowheart
36.text: Heh. Not worried, are you? Rest easy.

126.speaker: Shadowheart
126.text: To not being poisoned - how about that?
126.context: NodeContext: A toast, Shadowheart is sitting down.

146.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player drinks deeply from their cup (should match to last SH refill)

169.speaker: Shadowheart
169.text: Not one for taking things slowly, I see.
169.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Shadowheart refills (reuse)NodeContext: Shadowheart is sitting down.

101.speaker: Shadowheart
101.context: NodeContext: A toast, Shadowheart is sitting down.

96.speaker: Player
96.text: Did you think I wouldn't show?

80.speaker: Shadowheart
80.text: Lots of people make promises. Few keep them.

81.speaker: Player
81.text: Drain the cup in one swallow.

86.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player downs their cup all at once

73.speaker: Shadowheart
73.text: Someone's enthusiastic. Maybe I should have brought a barrel.
73.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Shadowheart refillsNodeContext: Shadowheart is sitting down.

143.speaker: Shadowheart
143.text: I was hoping for a toast. Any suggestions?
143.context: NodeContext: Shadowheart is sitting, and pours wine into a pair of cups.
